spec_data.Name: perl-MARC-XML
spec_data.Description:
MARC-XML is an extension to the MARC-Record distribution for working with XML
data encoded using the MARC21slim XML schema from the Library of Congress. For
more details see: http://www.loc.gov/standards/marcxml/
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 10 Aug 2017 08:44:15 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An extension to MARC::Record that supports an XML serialization of MARC
